## Pages
- [About Us](/about): Learn about our mission, vision, and expert providers at Oasis Health Services. Bringing a fresh perspective to mental health care.
- [Conditions We Treat](/about/conditions): Explore the mental health conditions we treat, including anxiety, depression, bipolar disorder, ADHD, OCD, PTSD, personality disorders, and psychotic disorders. Learn about care options and next steps.
- [Consent, Notices & Policies](/policies): Review our HIPAA Notice of Privacy Practices and Telehealth Informed Consent to understand how your medical information is used and your rights.
- [Contact Us](/contact): Get in touch with Oasis Health Services. We
- [Crisis Resources](/resources/crisis): Crisis Resources for mental health care and psychiatric services.
- [FAQ Resources](/resources/faq): FAQ Resources for mental health care and psychiatric services.
- [For Patients](/patients): Get started with Oasis Health Services. Complete our secure assessment, schedule your visit, and access patient resources.
- [For Providers](/providers): For providers, learn about our mental health services, including psychiatric care, therapy, and support groups.
- [Frequently Asked Questions](/patients/faqs): Find answers to common questions about our mental health services, insurance, appointments, and more.
- [Grief Support Screener](/resources/grief-support): Take our free grief support screener to understand your grief experience and find appropriate resources. This confidential self-assessment helps identify if you may benefit from professional grief counseling.
- [HIPAA](/hipaa): Review our HIPAA Notice of Privacy Practices and Telehealth Informed Consent to understand how your medical information is used and your rights.
- [Medication Information](/resources/medications): Educational resources about psychiatric medications including antidepressants, anti-anxiety medications, mood stabilizers, and ADHD medications. Learn what to expect from your treatment.
- [Mental Health Care](/): Expert mental health care tailored for you, combining psychiatric and primary care for whole-person healing. Covered by insurance.
- [Mental Health Self-Assessments](/assessments): Free, confidential mental health screening tools for depression (PHQ-9), anxiety (GAD-7), PTSD, ADHD, and more. Take validated assessments and get personalized recommendations.
- [Our Providers](/about/our-team): Meet our experienced mental health providers. Board-certified psychiatric nurse practitioners and licensed counselors specializing in anxiety, depression, ADHD, and more. Accepting new patients.
- [Page Not Found](/404): The page you
- [Provider Referrals](/providers/referrals): Refer your patients to Oasis Health Services for comprehensive mental health care and psychiatric services.
- [Resources](/resources): Resources for mental health care and psychiatric services.
- [Self-Care Resources](/resources/self-care): Self-Care Resources for mental health care and psychiatric services.
- [Services](/services): Explore our comprehensive mental health services, including psychiatric assessments, therapy, medication management, ADHD and autism assessment, SpravatoÂ® therapy, telehealth, and remote patient monitoring.
- [Start Now](/start): Begin your journey to better mental health. Complete our secure assessment and take the first step toward wellness with Oasis Health Services.
- [Support Groups](/resources/support-groups): Find local and online mental health support groups in Georgia. Connect with others facing similar challenges including depression, anxiety, ADHD, grief, and addiction recovery.
- [Telehealth Resources](/resources/telehealth): Telehealth Resources for mental health care and psychiatric services.
- [Terms & Conditions](/terms-and-conditions): Read the Terms and Conditions for using the services of Oasis Health Services.
- [Thank You | Oasis Health Services](/thank-you): Thank you for reaching out to Oasis Health Services. We have received your message and will get back to you soon.
